colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @019A *, ,CES BCOM LDAN 'DAS RDO RJE MI 'KHRUGS PA'I SGRUB DKYIL YONGS SU RDZOGS PA'I CHO GA MNGON PAR DGA' BA'I SGO 'BYED CES BYA BA 'DI NI, GNAS BRTAN YON TAN RGYAL MTSAN SOGS MANG POS SNGA MO NAS NAN GYIS BSKUL BA DANG, 'PHRAL DU 'BRAS SPUNGS PA DPON SLOB RNAMS DANG, DGE SLONG BLO BZANG PHUN TSOGS SOGS DU MAS MTSAMS SBYAR BA LA BRTEN NAS, RDO RJE 'CHANG CHEN PO'I LAM GYI RIM PA NAS GSUNGS PA'I BYA RGYUD RANG LAM JI LTA BA BZHIN DU, CHOS SMRA BA BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN GYIS, CHOS GRVA CHEN PO BKRA SHIS LHUN PO'I GTZUG LAG KHANG DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI ZHA LU PA TSE RING CHOS 'PHEL GYIS BGYIS PA'O, ,'DIS KYANG BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE PHYOGS DUS THAMS CAD DU RGYAS PAR BYED NUS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,TI shthA BADZRA,, ,,)
